name: hoppscotch-extension
description: Provides more features to the Hoppscotch webapp (https://hoppscotch.io/)

scripts.build:chrome: HOPP_EXTENSION_TARGET=CHROME parcel build src/* --dist-dir dist/ && copyfiles icons/* dist
scripts.build:firefox: HOPP_EXTENSION_TARGET=FIREFOX parcel build src/* --dist-dir dist/ && copyfiles icons/* dist

author: Andrew Bastin
